alert.note: Alert for Gage; Lancaster; Otoe; Saline (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 04 at 1:22AM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Lancaster, western Otoe, east central Saline and northern Gage Counties through 200 AM CDT... At 122 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Clatonia, or 12 miles northwest of Beatrice, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree branches and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Cortland and Hallam around 130 AM CDT. Firth around 135 AM CDT. Hickman and Roca around 140 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Panama, Bennet, Douglas and Palmyra. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
